name: Pareidolia (James Harper)
description:
Plunged into the dark with limited power, no communication, and with an overwhelming sense of something watching...

Pareidolia is a phenomenon caused by seeing shapes like faces in inanimate objects and patterns.

Pareidolia is also a game about finding your way back to your team.  Separated from your unit, you must solve puzzles while managing the battery for your work light;  the only thing keeping the dark at bay.  There are some things that are better left undisturbed and kept hidden in the dark.

Controls: MovementLeft/Right Arrow KeysJumpUp Arrow KeyInspectDown Arrow KeyToggle Battery ProjectionSpaceAdvance TextZSkip TextX
Functions: Change Window SizeTabFullscreen ToggleF11

An important note:

Pareidolia, as it is presented in its current state, is only a demo and is not expected to provide the full game experience.

This excavation was doomed from the start...
